description:
Hearing the voice of God and JournalingCan Christians hear the voice of God? Are we supposed to? This course takes on those questions boldly, it offers you the tools to create a direct line of communication with God and encourages you to keep that line of communication open on a consistent basis. Following most of the 20 lecture videos, we have provided you with thought provoking questions and exercises to enhance your abilities. This 3 hour course will help you gain the confidence you need to enter into a 2-way conversation with God and give you helpful tips on how to journal those conversations for you to look back and reflect on.

We can't encourage you enough to take this course.The blessings are amazing!
title: Hearing The Voice of God & Journaling
